predictions.text: The Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close above 19.5 at least once by 2025-09-06.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if the official Cboe VIX closing value (>19.5) appears on any trading day from 2025-08-19 through 2025-09-06 inclusive, as reported by Cboe or reliable market data sources (e.g., Yahoo Finance ticker ^VIX).
monitoring_signals: VIX futures term structure (contango/backwardation)
S&P 500 intraday breadth and realized volatility (5–10 day)
Fed communications and rates market repricing (CME FedWatch)
Credit spreads (CDX IG/HY) and equity-put skew
predictions.rationale: Pre-Fed uncertainty and broader risk-off in global equities raise near-term volatility odds. Crypto liquidation pressure and macro jitters can spill into equities, lifting VIX above typical summer ranges.

predictions.text: By 2025-08-30, the U.S. 10-year Treasury yield will close at least 12 bps below its 2025-08-19 close.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use U.S. Treasury Daily Treasury Yield Curve Rates or FRED DGS10 series. Let Y0 be the 10y close on 2025-08-19. Success if any subsequent daily close through 2025-08-30 is ≤ (Y0 − 0.12 percentage points).
monitoring_signals: Fed funds futures (CME) and rate-cut odds
Treasury auction demand (bid-to-cover, tails)
Economic surprises (PMIs, jobless claims)
MOVE index and term premium estimates
predictions.rationale: Event risk around the upcoming Fed meeting and flight-to-quality flows amid equity/crypto volatility support a modest rally in duration.

predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will trade intraday below $108,000 on Coinbase at least once by 2025-08-29.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify using Coinbase BTC-USD trade data or OHLC data (e.g., TradingView). Any recorded intraday low < $108,000 from now until 2025-08-29 23:59:59 UTC counts.
monitoring_signals: Perpetual funding rates and basis
Open interest and liquidation heatmaps (e.g., Coinglass)
Dollar index (DXY) moves and U.S. yields
Stablecoin netflows and BTC realized volatility
predictions.rationale: Post-surge washouts and elevated leverage make further downside probes likely into Fed-related macro volatility.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-19 close to 2025-09-13 close, Intel (INTC) will outperform the PHLX Semiconductor Index (SOX) by at least 5.0 percentage points.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute simple percentage returns using official closes (dividends ignored). INTC_return − SOX_return ≥ +5.0 pp between 2025-08-19 and 2025-09-13 closings. Data from Nasdaq/Cboe for INTC and Nasdaq for ^SOX/PHLX SOX.
monitoring_signals: U.S. policy headlines on potential government stake/CHIPS grants
SoftBank/strategic investor flows and analyst revisions for INTC
SOX breadth (NVDA/AMD leadership) and rotation into laggards
Foundry updates and customer pipeline news
predictions.rationale: Policy-backed catalysts can compress Intel’s discount versus peers, while broader semis face cyclical digestion after strong runs.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-15, at least one Fortune 500 company will disclose a material cybersecurity incident attributed to a third-party supplier or compromised open-source component.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if a Fortune 500 firm files an SEC Form 8-K (Item 1.05) or issues a press release naming a vendor/supplier or open-source component as the breach vector and characterizing the incident as material.
monitoring_signals: SEC 8-K filings feed for Item 1.05 disclosures
CISA advisories and KEV catalog updates
Vendor security bulletins and SBOM disclosures
Ransomware group blogs naming suppliers
predictions.rationale: Recent incidents highlight persistent supply-chain exposure; historical cadence suggests another material supplier-linked breach by mid-October.

predictions.text: The U.S. national average regular gasoline price (AAA) will be at least $0.05/gal higher on 2025-09-02 than on 2025-08-19.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check gasprices.aaa.com for the posted national average regular price on 2025-08-19 and 2025-09-02. Success if 2025-09-02 ≥ (2025-08-19 + $0.05/gal).
monitoring_signals: AAA daily national average and regional price trends
EIA weekly gasoline stocks and demand (PADD breakdown)
Crack spreads and Brent/WTI movements
Refinery utilization/outages ahead of Labor Day
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand into Labor Day and tightness in gasoline cracks can nudge national averages higher near-term.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, a China-based automaker will announce a new EV assembly plant or a manufacturing investment of at least $200 million outside China (e.g., EU, Mexico, Middle East).
predictions.verification_criteria: Company press release or reputable media (Reuters, Bloomberg, FT) reporting a new assembly plant or manufacturing capex ≥ $200M located outside China; announcement date on or before 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Announcements from BYD, SAIC, Geely, Chery, Xiaomi Auto
Host-country incentives and approvals
Tariff/trade developments in U.S. and EU
Local JV/partnership MOUs and land-use filings
predictions.rationale: Chinese OEMs are accelerating overseas capacity to navigate tariffs and expand share; recent trend suggests another sizable commitment this quarter.
